item.name: Change control-shift-3/4 to command-shift-3/4 in Remote Desktop.
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::KEY_3, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::KEY_3, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT,
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::KEY_4, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::KEY_4, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT,
